Interface IWingedBehavior

An interface for any Winged object that can be knocked to the ground.

Examples include Paragoombas and Stilt Guys. Parakarry is excluded, as he cannot be knocked to the ground.

Inherited Members
ICleanup.CleanUp()
Namespace: PaperMarioBattleSystem
Assembly: PaperMarioBattleSystem.dll
Syntax
public interface IWingedBehavior : ICleanup

ElapsedGroundedTurns

How many turns the object has been Grounded.

This is only used by Kammy Koopa in the PM games.

| Improve this Doc View Source

Grounded

Whether the object is Grounded or not. This is set to true when the object is knocked to the ground and loses its wings.

Declaration
bool Grounded { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
System.Boolean
| Improve this Doc View Source

GroundedEntity

The BattleEntity to become when grounded. It should not have a vulnerability to losing wings. Winged BattleEntities should use only the information from this and clear it after falling, unless they go airborne again.

Declaration
BattleEntity GroundedEntity { get; }
Property Value
Type Description
BattleEntity

This is only used by Kammy Koopa in the PM games.
